channel.title: Timers, Iote on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Timers, Iote on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Using Go timers for MQTT testing
item.description: This article uses a Go timer and the Go select statement to test our MQTT publish and subscribe in a single simple test statement. A quick note on the go testing package: it is much like the JUnit where tests using a particular naming convention TestXXX(t *testing.T) {} will be run automatically with easy to reports having been generated. The Problem The following code snippet is directly from the IoTe edge gateway project.
